pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Sunburst Hotel Resort Sunburst Home About us Casino Contact Your Privacy Policy At Sunburst Hotel Resort, we take your privacy seriously. We're committed to safeguarding your personal information and ensuring its security. Gathering Your Information When you make a reservation or interact with our website, we might collect personal details like your name, contact information, and payment methods. How We Use Your Information The information we collect helps us process reservations, enhance our services, and keep you informed about promotions or Sunburst Hotel Resort updates. Safeguarding Your Information We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure. Changes to this Policy We may occasionally update this Privacy Policy. We'll post any changes on this page, so we encourage you to review it periodically. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Sunburst Hotel Resort Sunburst Home About us Casino Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to the Terms and Conditions of Sunburst Hotel Resort. By accessing or using our services, you agree to abide by these terms and conditions. Reservations All reservations are subject to availability and confirmation. You must provide accurate and complete information when making a reservation. Check-In and Check-Out Check-in time is after 3:00 PM, and check-out time is before 11:00 AM. Early check-in or late check-out may be available upon request and subject to availability. Cancellations and Refunds Cancellation policies vary depending on the type of reservation and time of booking. Please review the specific cancellation policy stated at the time of booking. Use of Facilities Guests are expected to use hotel facilities and services responsibly. Any damages caused to hotel property or disruption to other guests may result in additional charges or penalties. Liability Sunburst Hotel Resort is not liable for any loss, damage, injury, or inconvenience caused by events beyond our control, including but not limited to natural disasters, acts of terrorism, or government regulations. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to this page. The Sunburst website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Sunburst HOME CASINO ABOUT US TERMS AND CONDITIONS DISCLAIMERS PRIVACY POLICY
